name: HealthKey
headline: AI-powered Patient Identification for Clinical Trial Research Sites
description: HealthKey is an AI-powered Patient Identification service for Clinical Trial Research Teams. Big Pharma pays Research Sites a lot of money for each patient they enroll, but finding patients who qualify is an entirely manual process today. We help Sites make more money by matching patient's EHR data with trials' eligibility criteria using AI.
tags: industry:saas; industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; industry:ai; location:austin

founders.name: Josh Sabol, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder/CEO of HealthKey. Previously a Product Manager at AWS, helping automate the ~$20B supply chain at AWS. I was the 1st PM at Plate IQ (S15), a B2B accounting & payments tool, which 10x'ed during my tenure and recently raised a $160M Series B from FTV Capital. üåê https://sabol.io/

# AI-Powered Patient Identification for Clinical Trial Teams
Integrate with your EHR and get emailed eligible patients for your clinical trials every day`‚úì Boost Enrollment` `‚úì Slash Screen Failures` `‚úì Maximize Revenue`

## Finding Eligible Patients is the worst **Where's Waldo?** game ever...
_There's a new cheat code:_
Let HealthKey Prescreen Patients
1. Connect
We connect to your EHR to analyze patients‚Äô data in a HIPAA compliant way.
2. Prescreen
We encode your trials' eligibility criteria and scan your EHR for candidates with AI.
3. Review
We present you matches with evidence from patients' records so your research team can qualify them.
  * [CalendarSee for yourself](https://gethealthkey.com/<#>)


### Qualify More Patients, Faster
## Double Your Patient Matches
in
## Half the Time
HealthKey‚Äôs AI replaces manual chart reviews‚Äîprocessing thousands of records in minutes. Simply upload your inclusion & exclusion criteria, and our platform delivers a ready-to-enroll list straight to your team.
  * [CalendarSchedule a Demo](https://gethealthkey.com/<#>)


## Get Started in 1-week

generated_description:
**HealthKey: Revolutionizing Patient Identification for Clinical Trials**

**Overview:**  
Founded in 2023 and based in Austin, TX, HealthKey operates at the intersection of healthcare and technology, specifically targeting the clinical trial sector. As part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch W25, HealthKey is a lean three-person team that focuses on making patient matching for clinical research faster, easier, and more efficient through AI.

**Mission:**  
HealthKey is dedicated to AI-powered patient identification for clinical trial research sites. The traditional process of finding eligible trial participants is painfully manual, which costs both time and resources. By leveraging AI, HealthKey automates the matching of Electronic Health Record (EHR) data with clinical trial eligibility criteria, enhancing enrollment and helping research sites significantly increase their revenue.

**How It Works:**  
1. **Connect**: HealthKey integrates smoothly with your existing EHR systems while ensuring HIPAA compliance.
2. **Prescreen**: The platform scans through patient records using AI to find candidates that meet the specific criteria for clinical trials.
3. **Review**: Research teams receive a detailed list of eligible patients accompanied by relevant records for quick qualification.

This three-step process allows sites to **double their patient matches in half the time**, all while reducing the hassle usually associated with manual patient chart reviews.

**Business Model:**  
HealthKey operates on a flexible pricing model tailored to the specific needs of each site, with no upfront costs and a simple flat fee structure based on usage. They are currently offering cost-effective deals including free implementation and protocol setups to new customers, emphasizing their commitment to easing the financial burden as sites transition to AI-driven patient recruitment.

**Key Features:**
- AI-driven automation to replace time-consuming manual chart reviews.
- Fast integration with various EHR platforms (including Athenahealth, Epic, and Allscripts).
- Enhanced data security with a priority on HIPAA compliance.

**Why It Matters:**  
For clinical trial operators, the quest for eligible patients can often feel like a frustrating game of ‚ÄúWhere's Waldo?‚Äù HealthKey provides a new "cheat code" to swiftly locate the right candidates. This technology not only improves patient enrollment but also significantly reduces screening failures, leading to better overall outcomes for clinical research teams and the pharmaceutical companies they serve.

You can learn more about HealthKey and its transformative approach to clinical trials by visiting their website at [Get HealthKey](https://gethealthkey.com).

To put it simply, HealthKey exemplifies how blending AI with healthcare processes can shift paradigms, enabling better resource utilization and potentially faster medical advancements.
